short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifications for Helmet Heroes Reborn Website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HHR Mods v3 provides:
- dark mode
- mute game sounds
- hide change logs
- hide intro text
- show server time
- adjust game size
- adjust game height
- chatango

All the options you picked save, so that next time you don't need to enable them again.
